name: Ghent
howToReach:
### by public transport

A free shuttle bus service connects you with Ghent Sint-Pieters train station. 

### by car

The Zuiderpoort is located near the main highway. There is sufficient parking underneath the building.

### I'm there what now?

Follow the signs "Esplanade 8" and take the elevator to floor 1 (or the stairs from ground level). Our offices are behind a door marked “Comma Group”.
